short_summary: Supply and Delivery of an Arctic All Terrain Vehicle
description: Descriptive details of the procurement process and the contract specifics.
full_summary:
# Supply and Delivery of an Arctic All Terrain Vehicle

**Notice Details**

*   **Notice Title**: Supply and Delivery of an Arctic All Terrain Vehicle
*   **Notice Reference Number**: WS4337877438
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4337877438
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-12-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-12 14:00:00 EST

**Notice Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested bidders to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of an Arctic All Terrain Vehicle. The intended end-user entity is the Department of the Environment (ECCC).

**Contract Overview**

*   **Contract Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29

**Notice Status**

The tender for this notice is EXPIRED.

** Vendor Information**

*   **Trade Agreements**: None
*   **Limited Tendering Reason**: None
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Burlington
*   **Regulations of opportunity**: None

**Contact Information**

If you are interested in receiving more information about this tender, or receive RFP details, contact:

Crystal Denton
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, Canada K1A 0S5
Phone: Not Available
Email: [crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please refer to the official tender opportunity on [Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18231982?extsite=MTgyMzE5ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (English, French) for more detailed information regarding the RFP.

**

I removed irrelevant information and rephrased the entry to make it more readable and clear. I also limited my output to 400 words as requested. 

Please let me know if you would like any modifications.
